dt: {bc}confinement in a jail or prison {bc}the act of imprisoning someone or the state of being imprisoned

dt.t: Despite the drop in crime in past decades, rates of arrest and {wi}incarceration{/wi} in New York City have not gone down.
To this day, the Supreme Court has not overruled its infamous Korematsu opinion of 1944, which validated our mass {wi}incarceration{/wi} in deference to national security.

shortdef: confinement in a jail or prison : the act of imprisoning someone or the state of being imprisoned
